definitions.definition: To laze, act in a lazy manner.
Unwilling to do work or make an effort; disinclined to exertion.
definitions.example: Get out of bed, you lazy lout!

definitions.definition: Causing or characterised by idleness; relaxed or leisurely.
definitions.example: I love staying inside and reading on a lazy Sunday.

definitions.definition: Showing a lack of effort or care.

definitions.example: We strolled along beside a lazy stream.

definitions.definition: (of a cattle brand) Turned so that (the letter) is horizontal instead of vertical.
Employing lazy evaluation; not calculating results until they are immediately required.
